title: Fight for Truth, Regardless of Party | Guest: Edwin Black | 5/26/21
description:
Glenn and Stu review George Floyd’s legacy one year after his death: Gunshots rang out near George Floyd Square, protesters jumped on a police car with the officers inside, and U.S. embassies are now allowed to fly Black Lives Matter flags. Pat Gray stops by to discuss John Cena’s pathetic apology to China for calling Taiwan a country. Historian Edwin Black teaches about the pro-Nazi sentiment that’s still in the Middle East today. BlazeTV host Steve Deace explains why he believes Dr. Fauci’s COVID flip-flopping and China are connected. Russell Brand spoke out against CNN and its “troubling” censorship of the Hunter Biden laptop story. Glenn argues why we should always be for truth, regardless if it confirms our prior beliefs.
